39b343a32a4f1ce18ee98a34618fda0a5404d6a0.commitMessage: Issue #3143: forbid empty return statements and fixed violations

77733a452387aa2ee99fdc9a737633566cc7af3d.commitMessage: Issue #2836: renamed error message fields to match standard naming

bc646907e94d628fa2037b752d72f8a7a25a0c4e.commitMessage: Issue #2451: removed excess hierarchy from MethodParamPadCheck

46a52f84c014e4d25379f429f11ed3de11fe8ae7.commitMessage:
Issue #1555: Rename methods returning boolean to use question word

Fixes some `BooleanMethodNameMustStartWithQuestion` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports boolean methods whose names do not start with a question word. Boolean methods that override library methods are ignored by this inspection.

cdf3e56bacd3895262af8a1df9ca5c81f4071970.commitMessage: Utils class has been splitted to CommonUtils and TokenUtils. Issue #1898

4d6e2376db89b69167de867bfc28f8d8624a6b78.commitMessage:
Move constants to left side of comparison. #1555

Fixes `ConstantOnLHSOfComparison` inspection violations.

Description:
>Reports on comparison operations with constant values on their left-hand side. Some coding conventions specify that constants should be on the right-hand side of comparisons.

1bd30555eac039d0486dffb3fc43b7a34117909b.commitMessage:
Remove useless parentheses to fix PMD violations, issue #744

Parentheses are considered unnecessary if the evaluation order of an expression remains unchanged if the parentheses are removed.

14172dd01adff4bc99296f633c4acad32e3d570f.commitMessage: Fixed 1374792.  Now we do not need to look for ident before lparen, we just look at char instead.

dc5ea22c7329171c5cacd974f554803eb3de674e.commitMessage:
Added check for the padding between the
identifier of a method definition, constructor definition,
method call, or constructor invocation;
and the left parenthesis of the parameter list.  (module
MethodParamPad, request 843254)
